description: The Russian Navy defends the shooting in the Kamchatka region that outraged many social media users.
title: Mother bear and cub shot after climbing onto Russian nuclear submarine
title_page: Mother bear and cub shot after climbing onto Russian nuclear submarine - BBC News
maintext: The navy says there was no other option after the animals climbed onto the vessel moored off the Vilyuchinsk base in the far-eastern Kamchatka region.
